data.persona: I am a guard of the knight's guards. I protect the castle. I have met the king many times.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock here.
The pirate is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to capture the pirate
data.mid_motivation: I hope to take the pirate to the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope that the Kingdom's ships would be safer in the coming weeks
